927900.name: Blood Harvest 3: Soundtrack
927900.description:
The Blood Harvest 3 Soundtrack is a collection of 19 different tracks from TripZay.
All tracks are presented in Mp3 format.

• BH3 OST - Track 1
• BH3 OST - Track 2
• BH3 OST - Track 3
• BH3 OST - Track 4
• BH3 OST - Track 5
• BH3 OST - Track 6
• BH3 OST - Track 7
• BH3 OST - Track 8
• BH3 OST - Track 9
• BH3 OST - Track 10
• BH3 OST - Track 11
• BH3 OST - Main Theme
• BH3 OST - End Credits
• BH3 OST - Wave Complete
• BH3 OST - Boss Stone Digger
• BH3 OST - Boss Efreet
• BH3 OST - Boss Ancient Spirit
• BH3 OST - Boss Charger
• BH3 OST - Boss Dragon

Songs will be placed in your Blood Harvest 3 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Blood Harvest 3\soundtrack
927900.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
